author: Open Canada
name: National Hydro Network - NHN - GeoBase Series

author: Natural Resources Canada
name: Maps of Canada's forest attributes for 2001

author: Natural Resources Canada
name: Maps of Canada's forest attributes for 2011

author: Mastasci et al. (2017)
name: Three decades of forest structural dynamics over Canada's forested ecosystems
comments: Wall-to-wall estimates of forest structure. Mastasci et al. 2017

author: NASA - NEO
name: Active Fires (Terra/MODIS)
comments: Fire maps show the locations of actively burning fires around the world on a monthly basis

author: Hall et al. (2020)
name: National Burned Area Composite
comments: Generating annual estimates of forest fire disturbance in Canada: the National Burned Area Composite

author: WWF
name: GLWD-level1
comments: Level 1 (GLWD-1) comprises the 3067 largest lakes (area ≥ 50 km2) and 654 largest reservoirs (storage capacity ≥ 0.5 km3) worldwide, and includes extensive attribute data

author: WWF
name: GLWD-level2
comments: Level 2 (GLWD-2) comprises permanent open water bodies with a surface area ≥ 0.1 km2 excluding the water bodies contained in GLWD-1. The approximately 250,000 polygons of GLWD-2 are attributed as lakes, reservoirs and rivers.

author: WWF
name: GLWD-level3
comments: Level 3 (GLWD-3) comprises lakes, reservoirs, rivers and different wetland types in the form of a global raster map at 30-second resolution
